name: Ars Technica - Minimal Dark
description: Makes Ars Technica darker and easier to view. Created primarily for my own use, however if someone makes a recommendation or suggestion that I like, I may implement it.
additional_info:
03/07/18 - Initial Release.
03/08/18 - Forum fixed, added comment support, other minor fixes and tweaks.
05/08/18 - Small tweaks and fixes
10/12/18 - Updated to match changes made on the site.
01/17/19 - Minor changes to improve readability of comments
01/29/19 - More minor changes for readability
02/08/19 - Updated to reflect minor changes on site.
03/05/19 - Removed new ad "crown" at the top of the site.
03/21/19 - Another update to once again remove ads.
